abstract: Senate votes 56 to 42 to reject amendment related to Keystone XL pipeline legislation that would have declared climate change to be real, dangerous, and caused by human action; vote is second in two days on issue, as Democrats use debate over pipeline to force Republicans to come out one way or another on climate change.
lead_paragraph: Senators are using the Keystone XL pipeline debate to argue over climate issues.
snippet: Senators are using the Keystone XL pipeline debate to argue over climate issues.

headline.main: Senate Rejects Human Role in Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Senate Rejects Human Role in Climate
